ar: وَمَا لَكُمْ لَا تُقَتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ
en: And what is [the matter] with you that you fight not in the cause of Allah

ar: وَمَا لَكُمْ لَا تُقَتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ
en: And what is [the matter] with you that you fight not in the cause of Allah
take us out of this city
and appoint for us from Yourself a protector
and appoint for us from Yourself a helper"?
fight in the cause of Allah,
fight in the cause of taghut.
So fight against the allies of Satan.
Indeed, the plot of Satan has ever been weak.
